meanings.definition: To institute legal proceedings against someone.
meanings.sent1: She decided to sue her neighbor for the damage to her fence.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to sue the competitor for patent infringement.
meanings.sent3: The cat jokingly threatened to sue the dog for stealing its toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers seemed to sue the sun for shining too brightly on them.
meanings.sent5: The student learned about the right to sue for justice in class.

meanings.definition: To make a petition or appeal.
meanings.sent1: They will sue the council for a new playground in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to sue the government for better healthcare policies.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully sue their parents for more ice cream after dinner.
meanings.sent4: The trees seem to sue the wind for blowing their leaves away.
meanings.sent5: The citizens gathered to sue for cleaner streets in their town.
